name: "Escaping Reality" Dia Kurosawa
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one blue character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have any other 【REST】 characters in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavor_text: Huh? Where is the snack bar?

name: "My Best Friend" Mari Ohara
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top two cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a level 0 or lower character revealed among those cards, until end of turn, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking.
flavor_text: I wasn't honest with my best friends, and wasted two years. I know what I'm talking about!

name: "Aim to Shine" Kanan Matsuura
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose a character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: "Stewshine" Mari Ohara
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if all players do not have any open positions on their stage, all players draw a card.
flavor_text: Stewshine, please!

name: Thinking For the Other
ability: Choose a 《Music》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. Put this card into your memory.
flavor_text: Dia: "How you fit in… How you feel… And, your future… She cares about it more than anyone."

name: MIRAI TICKET
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: "Let's become light!""Let's become light!"

name: Mijuku DREAMER
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavor_text: "I want you to understand me.""I want you to understand me."

name: Mini Yoshiko
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.

【ACT】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Look at up to two cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Mini Ruby
ability: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to two times per turn. When your other 《Music》 character is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Mini Hanamaru
ability: 【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects.
【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +1000 power.

name: Mini You
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, your opponent chooses the number 0 or 1. Put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and if that card is a card of a level that matches the number that your opponent chose, draw up to X cards. X is equal to the number that your opponent chose +1. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Mini Chika
ability: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

name: Mini Riko
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, your opponent may draw two cards. If your opponent does, your opponent chooses two cards from your opponent's hand, and puts it into his or her waiting room.

name: Mini Kanan
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is four or more, all of your other characters get +500 power.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top two cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Mini Mari
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top two cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, 【REST】 this card.

name: Mini Dia
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw a card, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: "Let's Sing Together!" Kanan & Dia & Mari
ability: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +1000 power.
【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: "Let's Sing Together!" Chika & Riko & You
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top two cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: "Let's Sing Together!" Yoshiko & Hanamaru & Ruby
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your "Music" characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
